title: New Patient Outcome Assessed in Psoriasis Biologic Trial - Medscape

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 67% completion rate achieved with PROs in psoriasis trial; WHO-5 Well-Being Index showed improvement from baseline to follow-up.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate automated PRO reminders at key intervals (e.g., day 3, week 4) to enhance patient engagement and data completeness.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: Increased regulatory pressure for PRO inclusion in trials; compliance may soon be a requirement rather than an option.
**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias could affect the representativeness of PRO data; efforts are needed to ensure diverse patient participation.
